metadata.title: CVE-2024-5702 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory corruption in the networking stack could have led to a potentiallyexploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125, Firefox ESR <115.12, and Thunderbird < 115.12.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
